title: Bug 17618 - Changing output location should delete all derived resources
OB: When creating a project with autobuild enabled and importing Java sources and resources, changing the output folder to project/bin removes all class files as expected. However, changing the output folder back to the project does not delete the class files. When opening the properties dialog for these files in project/bin, they are tagged as 'Derived'.
EB: When changing the output folder back to the project, all class files should be removed, including any derived resources. Opening the project/bin folder should not show any class files or derived resources.
SR:
To reproduce:
1) Create a project with autobuild enabled
2) Import Java sources and resources
3) Change the output folder to project/bin
4) All class files should be removed
5) Change the output folder back to the project
6) All class files should be removed
7) Open the project/bin folder and verify that there are no class files or derived resources.
